title: Ed Davey – 2014 Speech to Scottish Renewables Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Ed Davey, the Secretary of State for Energy and Climate Change, to the Scottish Renewables Conference on 18th March 2014.

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations
